name: Hungry Frog (itch) (Mr. Mustard Games)
description:
My first completely solo game, made for Mini-jam with a frog theme.

The game itself is very simple, you just have to jump to make the frog eat the mustards that fly above it, but you must do it fast or the frog will be overcome by the growing hunger!

Please let me comment with what you think of the game and if you can, tell me what was your record of points in the game.

To see more of my future projects: https://twitter.com/MrMustardGames
